about_the_game:
This Happily Ever After DLC continues your relationship storyline with Mavie the Traveling Merchant!


STORY

Now that the Battle for Stars Reach after parties have died down, its time to return the empty beer barrels to Brindle. And there's a lot of them!
Normally this task falls to the Traveling Merchant, Mavie alone, but since there are rumors of goblin gangs still scattered about, the Commander has requested Mavie to be escorted by a member of the Castle Guard... or perhaps escorted by you?

Will you join Mavie on her Troublesome Trade Route adventure? Your destination is only a few days ride up the path, what could go wrong?

Faulty Apprentice Second DLC-- Troublesome Trade Route!

This DLC update takes place after the GOOD ENDING in the Base game/Main Story. You will also need a save data from Day 20. This DLC contains full body nudity, erotic dialogue, and consensual sexual act.

MAIN FEATURES

  • Sexual Content! - Since this is the Happily Ever After sequel as Mavie's lover, you can now engage in an intimate moment with Mavie, all the way. No more black screen!
  • Animated Artwork! - See Mavie in action! Enjoy the upgraded Live2D sexual interaction in this DLC! So not just no more black screen, but movements!
  • Fully Voiced! - This DLC features a full English voiceover from the beginning till the end!

JOIN THE COMMUNITY

Join the conversation here or Faulty Apprentice Server, and let the AGL studios team know what you think of the game. We read all of the player's feedback!

content_descriptors.notes:
This DLC may contain content not appropriate for all ages, or may not be appropriate for viewing at work: Nudity or Sexual Content, General Mature Content. 

All characters depicted in this game are over the age of 18 and older.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 or higher
  • Processor: Intel® Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX compatible card
  • Storage: 2 MB available space
